official-title.#text:
To prohibit Federal funds for the establishment or
		  operation of patient navigator programs under the Patient Protection and
		  Affordable Care Act, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Protecting Taxpayer Dollars and
			 Identity under Obamacare Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, regardless
			 of whether such a program is established in connection with a State or
			 Federally operated Exchange.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1311/ss:i/p:3

text.#text:
None of the funds
			 authorized or appropriated by Federal law may be used for the establishment or
			 operation of a navigator program under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or for the
			 establishment or operation of any non-navigator program that provides any of
			 the types of assistance described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1311(i) of the Patient
			 Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1311/ss:i

header.#text:
Prohibition of
			 Federal funds for the establishment or operation of patient navigator
			 programs

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2087 IH: Protecting Taxpayer Dollars and Identity under Obamacare Act
